catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 931
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: lopsided jar with very dark brown glaze; faceted walls, rounded shoulder, low, flat mouth, small foot; incised lines around lip and shoulder; lighter material shows through in raised areas below glaze; no glaze on mouth
title: Faceted jar
